MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the ML11 postcode area of Biggar and Lanark. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 12:42pm due to reports of a grounded overhead line and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2:45pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12:47pm on Friday, 13 November 2020
